channel.title: IMEI Code
channel.description: I have recently heard there is a way to change the IMEI number of a mobile device every few seconds/minutes or hours using a loop, although I don't know the process of doing so, has anyone got expeirence with this?

item.title: IMEI Code
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

I understand the illegal effects this can cause, although while browsing deep into the phone i managed to disable the watchdog feature that records the IMEI number when put on charge. Hopefully now disabled it is untrackable to the sim IMEI verification.

OS software: buda 1.1

Read full topic

item.title: IMEI Code
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Saphire`:

I have recently heard there is a way to change the IMEI number of a mobile device every few seconds/minutes or hours using a loop, although I don’t know the process of doing so, has anyone got expeirence with this?

I’m not so sure about standard phones however if your phone is a dual/tri/quad simcard mobile chances are you have a mobile phones that a “copy product” running MTK you can change your IMEI with a usb cord and some software. Be cautious of doing this unless you are in mainland china as other cell phone service providers/ some countries don’t find it cute.

Read full topic
